filmography.title: So Ends Our Night
filmography.role_description: A young German refugee fleeing the Nazis who falls in love while trying to survive without a passport.
filmography.plot: Three refugees roam Europe without passports, trying to stay one step ahead of the Nazis.

filmography.title: A Stolen Life
filmography.role_description: A lighthouse inspector who becomes the object of affection for twin sisters, played by Bette Davis.
filmography.plot: A twin sister assumes the identity of her deceased sibling to win back the man she loves.

filmography.title: Gilda
filmography.role_description: A small-time gambler in Argentina whose loyalty to his boss is tested when his former flame, Gilda, reappears as the boss's wife.
filmography.plot: A gambler discovers that his employer's new wife is his former lover, leading to a dangerous web of jealousy and betrayal.

filmography.title: Framed
filmography.role_description: An unemployed mining engineer who is seduced by a femme fatale into a scheme to frame him for embezzlement.
filmography.plot: An out-of-work engineer gets involved with a woman planning to frame him for a crime he didn't commit.

filmography.title: The Undercover Man
filmography.role_description: A determined Treasury agent who risks his life and family to bring down a powerful mob boss using tax laws.
filmography.plot: A federal agent aims to bring down a mob boss by investigating his tax evasion schemes.

filmography.title: The Big Heat
filmography.role_description: A relentless homicide detective who goes on a violent crusade against the mob after they murder his wife.
filmography.plot: A tough cop takes on a corrupt political syndicate after they kill his wife in a car bomb meant for him.

filmography.title: The Man from the Alamo
filmography.role_description: A soldier branded a coward for leaving the Alamo to protect his family, who must prove his bravery.
filmography.plot: The lone survivor of the Alamo is branded a coward and must fight to clear his name and expose a group of traitors.

filmography.title: Human Desire
filmography.role_description: A Korean War veteran returning to his job as a train engineer, who gets entangled in a murderous affair with a married woman.
filmography.plot: A train engineer becomes involved in a love triangle and a murder plot with a co-worker's sultry wife.

filmography.title: Blackboard Jungle
filmography.role_description: An idealistic teacher at an inner-city trade school who faces violence and apathy from his delinquent students.
filmography.plot: A new English teacher at a violent, unruly inner-city school is determined to do his job, despite resistance from both students and faculty.

filmography.title: Interrupted Melody
filmography.role_description: The devoted physician husband of opera star Marjorie Lawrence, who helps her battle polio.
filmography.plot: The true story of Australian opera singer Marjorie Lawrence, who struggles to return to the stage after being crippled by polio.

filmography.title: Trial
filmography.role_description: A law professor who defends a Mexican teenager accused of murder, discovering the case is being exploited by communists.
filmography.plot: A lawyer defends a Mexican boy accused of murder, only to find that the organization hiring him has ulterior political motives.

filmography.title: Ransom!
filmography.role_description: A wealthy executive whose son is kidnapped, and who makes the controversial decision to offer the ransom as a bounty on the kidnappers.
filmography.plot: A wealthy man's son is kidnapped, and he shocks the nation by refusing to pay the ransom, instead offering it as a reward for the criminals' capture.

filmography.title: Jubal
filmography.role_description: A drifter seeking redemption who finds work on a ranch but becomes the target of a jealous foreman.
filmography.plot: A Wyoming rancher's wife takes a liking to a new cowhand, sparking deadly jealousy from the ranch foreman.

filmography.title: The Fastest Gun Alive
filmography.role_description: A mild-mannered storekeeper with a secret past as a legendary gunslinger, forced to pick up his weapon one last time.
filmography.plot: A peaceful storekeeper is forced to reveal his prowess with a gun when a notorious outlaw threatens his town.

filmography.title: The Teahouse of the August Moon
filmography.role_description: An American captain sent to Americanize an Okinawan village who ends up going native and building a teahouse.
filmography.plot: An American captain is sent to okinawan village to teach democracy, but the culture and the interpreter change him instead.

filmography.title: 3:10 to Yuma
filmography.role_description: A charming but deadly outlaw leader who engages in a psychological battle of wills with the farmer capturing him.
filmography.plot: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw leader until a train arrives to take him to court in Yuma.

filmography.title: Don't Go Near the Water
filmography.role_description: A Navy public relations officer stationed on a tropical island who uses his wits to navigate military bureaucracy and romance.
filmography.plot: A Navy PR unit stationed on a Pacific island during WWII spends more time dealing with press relations than the war.

filmography.title: The Sheepman
filmography.role_description: A tough, easy-going stranger who brings a herd of sheep into cattle country, using humor and wits to survive the range war.
filmography.plot: A stranger wins a herd of sheep in a poker game and drives them into cattle country, sparking a feud.

filmography.title: Cowboy
filmography.role_description: A hard-bitten trail boss who reluctantly takes a tenderfoot hotel clerk (Jack Lemmon) on a cattle drive.
filmography.plot: A Chicago hotel clerk buys his way onto a cattle drive to prove he can be a cowboy, clashing with the tough trail boss.

filmography.title: The Gazebo
filmography.role_description: A television writer who plots to murder a blackmailer and hide the body under a gazebo in his backyard.
filmography.plot: A writer is blackmailed with nude photos of his wife, so he takes matters into his own hands with a murder plot that goes comically wrong.

filmography.title: Cimarron
filmography.role_description: A restless adventurer and newspaper editor who participates in the Oklahoma Land Rush and struggles with domestic life.
filmography.plot: A newspaper editor settles in an Oklahoma boom town with his reluctant wife at the end of the nineteenth century.

filmography.title: Pocketful of Miracles
filmography.role_description: A superstitious New York gangster who helps an apple seller pose as a wealthy society matron for her daughter's visit.
filmography.plot: A gangster helps an apple seller impersonate a wealthy woman so her daughter can marry a Spanish count.

filmography.title: The Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse
filmography.role_description: An Argentine playboy living in Paris who is forced to choose sides when his family is torn apart by World War II.
filmography.plot: An extended family is split by opposing loyalties during the Nazi occupation of France in World War II.

filmography.title: Experiment in Terror
filmography.role_description: An FBI agent who races to protect a bank teller and her sister from an asthmatic, psychopathic extortionist.
filmography.plot: An FBI agent tries to catch a criminal who is terrorizing a bank teller into helping him rob her bank.

filmography.title: The Courtship of Eddie's Father
filmography.role_description: A widower trying to raise his young son, who actively tries to find his father a new wife.
filmography.plot: A widower's son plays matchmaker for his father, trying to find the perfect new mother.

filmography.title: The Rounders
filmography.role_description: An aging, modern-day cowboy who, along with his partner, tries to tame a wild horse and make a profit.
filmography.plot: Two aging bronco busters try to settle down with a roan horse that no one can ride.

filmography.title: Midway
filmography.role_description: The calm and strategic U.S. Navy admiral who commands the carrier task force during the decisive Battle of Midway.
filmography.plot: A dramatization of the battle that was a turning point in the Pacific Theater of World War II.

filmography.title: Superman
filmography.role_description: The wise, earthly adoptive father of Superman who instills in him the values of humanity.
filmography.plot: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.
